titleStmt.title: Soveraign omnipotency the saint's security in evil days Discoursed and concluded from Rom. IV. xvii, xviii.
titleStmt.author: Crompton, William, 1599?-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benj. Alsop, at the Angel and Bible in the Poultrey; and are to be sold by James Cowsey, bookseller in Exeter,

notesStmt.note: With a separate dated title page: The justice of God asserted, in seeming contrariants providences; with separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
